languages.text: Лорд-капитан, будто бы не придав значения случившемуся, убрал{mf||а} клинок в ножны и покинул{mf||а} грузовой отсек, не проронив ни слова.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан, будто бы не придав значения случившемуся, убрал{mf||а} клинок в ножны и покинул{mf||а} грузовой отсек, не проронив ни слова.

languages.text: The Lord Captain, seemingly not attaching any importance to the situation, sheathed the blade and left the cargo bay without a word.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан, будто бы не придав значения случившемуся, убрал{mf||а} клинок в ножны и покинул{mf||а} грузовой отсек, не проронив ни слова.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain, seemingly not attaching any importance to the situation, sheathed the blade and left the cargo bay without a word.
The Lord Captain, seemingly not attaching any importance to the situation, sheathed the blade and left the cargo bay without a word.

The Lord Captain, seemingly not attaching any importance to the situation, sheathed the blade and left the cargo bay without a word.
The Lord Captain, seemingly not attaching any importance to the situation, sheathed the blade and left the cargo bay without a word.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは、状況に特に重要性を付けず、剣を鞘に納め、何も言わずに貨物ベイを去った。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain, seemingly not attaching any importance to the situation, sheathed the blade and left the cargo bay without a word.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは、状況に特に重要性を付けず、剣を鞘に納め、何も言わずに貨物ベイを去った。

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine}, qui ne semblait pas accorder la moindre importance à la situation, rengaina sa lame et quitta la soute sans mot dire.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain, seemingly not attaching any importance to the situation, sheathed the blade and left the cargo bay without a word.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine}, qui ne semblait pas accorder la moindre importance à la situation, rengaina sa lame et quitta la soute sans mot dire.

languages.text: 舰长大人似乎完全不在意这样的情况。他将那把刀收了起来，之后一言不发地离开了货舱。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain, seemingly not attaching any importance to the situation, sheathed the blade and left the cargo bay without a word.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人似乎完全不在意这样的情况。他将那把刀收了起来，之后一言不发地离开了货舱。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán, al parecer sin darle mayor importancia a la situación, envainó la espada y se marchó de la bahía de carga sin decir palabra.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain, seemingly not attaching any importance to the situation, sheathed the blade and left the cargo bay without a word.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán, al parecer sin darle mayor importancia a la situación, envainó la espada y se marchó de la bahía de carga sin decir palabra.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain maß der Situation offenbar keine große Bedeutung bei. {mf|Er|Sie} steckte die Klinge weg und verließ das Frachtmodul ohne ein weiteres Wort.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain, seemingly not attaching any importance to the situation, sheathed the blade and left the cargo bay without a word.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain maß der Situation offenbar keine große Bedeutung bei. {mf|Er|Sie} steckte die Klinge weg und verließ das Frachtmodul ohne ein weiteres Wort.

languages.text: Gördüğümüz kadarıyla vaziyeti kale almayan Lord Kaptan, bıçağı kınına koyup tek söz etmeden kargo bölmesinden ayrıldı.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain, seemingly not attaching any importance to the situation, sheathed the blade and left the cargo bay without a word.

traits.locale_text: Gördüğümüz kadarıyla vaziyeti kale almayan Lord Kaptan, bıçağı kınına koyup tek söz etmeden kargo bölmesinden ayrıldı.
